revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Flower Paradise |image = [[File:Flower Paradise.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Flower Paradise |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 224, the far top right. }} '''Flower Paradise''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]] which is 8x8 in size (64 tiles in total), contain 8 chests, 19 non-boss encounters, 1 Boss encounter and 36 empty tiles.
== Dungeon Stats ==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Regular Pokémon || 2,203,000 |- | Meganium (Boss) || 7,000,000 |- | Venusaur (Boss) || 7,900,000 |- | Shaymin (Sky) (Boss) || 9,000,000 |- | Shaymin (Land) (Boss) || 9,000,000 |}
== Pokémon ==
Following pokémon can be found in this [[dungeons|dungeon]].
* Vileplume * Bellsprout * Exeggutor * Bellossom * Skiploom * Sunflora * Roselia * Venusaur (boss) * Meganium (boss) * Shaymin (Land) (boss) * Shaymin (Sky) (boss)
== Items ==
Following items can be found in chests when they are opened in this [[dungeons|dungeon]].
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
revision.comment: added a bit of more info
